attributes.action: Stop Issuing Parking Tickets During Covid-19 Outbreak
attributes.additional_details: We as civil enforcement officers would like to know how is issuing parking tickets is categorised as an key worker. Our british citizens are already in a hard financial situation and giving them an parking ticket would just make it more frustrating and difficult for everyone.
attributes.background: We as civil enforcement officers are being categorised as an “Key-worker” throughout this covid-19 outbreak. We are frightened to be on roads from both the member of public and the virus, we get an extreme amount of verbal abuse and on some occasions we even get spitted at.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307972

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
